column5: My place is close to  SXSW venues Poodies Roadhouse Pace Bend Park Pedernales River Marble Falls Texas Hill Country Apis Restaurant.   Youâ€™ll love my place because of the relaxing location, the pool, Canyon to hike in, Pedernales River to play in or launch your boat, the private park on the river, the people, the ambiance, the outdoors space, and the neighborhood. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.  Dog and cats on property.
